title: fragment/mediawiki/common
description: Common schema fields for all Mediawiki entities

$schema.description: A URI identifying the JSONSchema for this event. This should match an schema's $id in a schema repository. E.g. /schema/title/1.0.0

uri.description: Unique URI identifying the event or entity

request_id.description: Unique ID of the request that caused the event

dt.description: UTC event datetime, in ISO-8601 format

domain.description: Domain the event or entity pertains to

stream.description: Name of the stream (dataset) that this event belongs in

database.description: The name of the wiki database this event entity belongs to.

performer.description: Represents the user that performed this change.

user_id.description: The user id that performed this change.  This is optional, and will not be present for anonymous users.

user_text.description: The text representation of the user that performed this change.

user_groups.description: A list of the groups this user belongs to.  E.g. bot, sysop etc.

user_is_bot.description: True if this user is considered to be a bot at the time of this event. This is checked via the $user->isBot() method, which considers both user_groups and user permissions.

user_registration_dt.description: The datetime of the user account registration. Not present for anonymous users or if missing in the MW database.

user_edit_count.description: The number of edits this user has made at the time of this event. Not present for anonymous users.
